name: Brave: The Video Game
description:
Players can run, jump and battle their way through the rugged landscape of mythical Scotland. By utilizing their wits and bravery, players will face off against fierce enemies to end a magical curse and save the kingdom.

Features

• Play as Merida single-player or co-op with a Will O’ The Wisp
• Use a sword or bow and arrow as weapons throughout the game
• Solve puzzles
